newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: Australia stocks seen up, on Dow, oil, metals rise.
newsitem.headline: Australia stocks seen up, on Dow, oil, metals rise.

text.p: *Stocks seen firmer at opening on Wall Street jump, stronger base metal prices, oil price rally, gold futures rise and upward rebound in bond and SPI futures contracts.
*U.S. stocks ended higher lifted after a drop in long-term interest rates that helped investors put a positive spin on the impact of a proposed capital gains tax cut.
*ADRs: News Corp 18-5/8 (+1/8) BHP 28-1/2 (+3/8), WMC 24-1/2 (+5/8) National Australia Bank 70-3/8 (-1/8).
*New York gold ended higher. Base metals stumble in LME trading, but still ended strong. Zinc was the star of the day.
